description:
Feel clean and refreshed with Niugini Organics’ Coconut Oil Soap Lemongrass. This handmade soap is made using a traditional boiled method and only contains four ingredients including 100% pure cold pressed virgin organic coconut oil. Added lemongrass essential oil provides an uplifting scent. A deep cleansing soap with a luxurious lather. 
Key benefits:
No preservatives, perfumes, dyes or palm oil
100% pure cold pressed virgin organic coconut oil
Softens and smooths the skin
Niugini Organics is based in Papua New Guinea - Australia’s closest neighbour. Pacific Islanders have always used coconut and flowers in their hair and on their skin. The rationale then is the same as now; take a centuries-old tradition and make it relevant to the 21st century. Niugini Organics pride themselves on creating pure organic coconut oil and soaps.
name: Niugini Organics 100G
